entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wrigley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wrigley Airport 3:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -31.9°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
